full_text: | BPE rey 2016/KER/60 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA MONDAY, THE 4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2016/14TH POUSHA, 1937 Cri.MC.No. 7773 of 2015 () CC. NO.1342/2014 OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-I, KOTTAYAM. PETITIONER(S): V.M. KURIYAKOSE, S/O. MATHEW, VEMBILAMATTATHIL HOUSE, PAMPADY VILLAGE, KOTTAYAM DISTRICT. BY ADV. SRI.A.K.HARIDAS. RESPONDENT(S): 1. STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, PIN -682 031. 2. SUPERINTENDENT OF POLICE, KOTTAYAM DISTRICT -686 001. 3. ASHA CHERIYAN, D/O. KURUVILLA, ARAKKAMATTATHIL HOUSE, KOOROPPADA VILLAGE, KOTTAYAM- 686 502. 4, KURUVILLA, ARAKKAMATTATHIL HOUSE, KOOROPPADA VILLAGE, KOTTAYAM- 686 502. R1 & R2 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT.P. MAYA. THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04-01-2016, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: rs. | BPE rey 2016/KER/60 Crl.MC.No. 7773 of 2015 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S ANNEXURES:- ANNEXURE A1 TRUE COPY OF FINAL REPORT IN C.C NO 1138/2014 OF J.F.M.C -l, KOTTAYAM. ANNEXURE A2 COMPLAINT BY PETITIONER. RESPONDENT'S ANNEXURES:- NIL. /ITRUE COPY// P.S. TO JUDGE rs. Pn) 2016/KER/60 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. ee ee ae ORDER Petitioner is the defacto complainant. His complaint is that the investigating officer has not arraigned two other persons who were involved in the incident, as accused in the case. When final report has been filed and the same has been accepted by the court below, it is open to the petitioner to approach the court below with a petition under Section 173(8) CrPC. seeking a further investigation in the matter. In such a case, the court below shall pass appropriate orders in accordance with law. In case the application is not entertained, it is open to the petitioner to approach this Court again. With such a liberty, this Crl.M.C. is disposed of. Sd/- B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE ul/- [True copy] PS. to Judge
